AdministrixMod:ConductorRitualBaton.NAME: Conductor's Ritual Baton
AdministrixMod:ConductorRitualBaton.FLAVOR: A golden shaku, really, and your favourite dramatic gesturing aide. Control the fight's tempo.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time each turn you play #b

AdministrixMod:PrescriptionBottle.NAME: Prescription Bottle
AdministrixMod:PrescriptionBottle.FLAVOR: Self-medication may have been necessary for survival, but that sister-in-arms god/doctor was a far better replacement.

AdministrixMod:GoldenChickadee.NAME: Golden Chickadee
AdministrixMod:GoldenChickadee.FLAVOR: You hatched ages ago, of course.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a #yRare card into your deck, #yUpgrade it.

AdministrixMod:ElixirOfImmorality.NAME: Elixir Of Immorality
AdministrixMod:ElixirOfImmorality.FLAVOR: You've long surpassed that other wicked hermit's medicines. Still, her work has some (dubious) potency left...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
At the start of turn #b2, gain #b
At the start of turn #b4, gain #b

AdministrixMod:AlphaAttackCounter.NAME: Attack Counter
AdministrixMod:AlphaAttackCounter.FLAVOR: (A proper custom UI element for Duality and the Shaku will come up eventually.)
DESCRIPTIONS: This does nothing besides count how many Attacks you've played each turn.

AdministrixMod:AlphaSkillCounter.NAME: Skill Counter
AdministrixMod:AlphaSkillCounter.FLAVOR: (Probably will also steal away Yin and Yang into such to reduce the endless power count.)
DESCRIPTIONS: This does nothing besides count how many Skills you've played each turn.
